greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists n terms, starting with 1, with gaps = n-2 between successive terms.
comment: Note that the last term of the n-th row is the central polygonal number A002061(n-1).
xref: Cf. A060354 (row sums). - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 20 2009
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 09 2009
